channel.title: functional programming on Selena Tabbara
channel.description: Recent content in functional programming on Selena Tabbara

item.title: Tiny Functional Language
item.description: The aim is to make a usable untyped functional language system all written in F# which allows the implementation of pure functional features like Church numbers. The work modularises as: Lexer Parser Lambda closure run time system The lexer perform a lexical analysis, the process of converting the stream of characters to words (‘tokens’). The parser then use these tokens to find the relationship between them and determine the syntax.
